alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:14PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lewis County through 945 PM PDT... At 914 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Winchester, or 21 miles southeast of Lapwai, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Craigmont and Winchester. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 269 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
